name: Disney's The Emperor's New Groove (2000)
description:
It's All About ME
Jump back! Now it's your turn to be the llama. Spit for distance, leap gaping chasms, and tangle with blood-hungry jaguars to foil the wicked genius Yzma. Think you've got enough game to be ME? Boo Ya!
A Groovy Quest: Grab gold hearts, precious coins and other treasures
Be the Llama: Hop side-winding platforms, smash barriers and crack baffling puzzles
Swingin' Moves: Run, jump, charge--even spit on Yzma's evil minions.
